mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Community.LinkedIn.ProfileButton
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Allows you to add a button for your or other person's LinkedIn public profile to a web page.
